ETYMOLOGY: Abbreviation of 'Mister', which is a title derived from Middle English 'maister' (master).

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A title used before the surname, full name, or occupation of a man, regardless of whether he is married or unmarried.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 先生；用于男士的姓氏、全名或职业名称之前的称谓，不区分婚否。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: Please direct your questions to Mr. Johnson.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 请将您的问题直接向约翰逊先生提出。

REGISTER: Formal and everyday use when referring to or addressing men.
